text: 1 love learning. | go out of my way to thoroughly understand topics we cover in class or interesting things | discover while working on projects. One such example is my passion for optimising the learning process. | found the retrospective revision method helpful in my studies. It is based on blah, but since it lacks blah blah, | combined it with X and Y methods which are particularly strong with regards to x and y. To streamline the use of this method, | developed an app in which, in addition to the things above, | included Z.
